posts.topic_title: One line O(1) solution and explanation
O(1) Efficient Single-line Java using Bit Checking

posts.python: class Solution(object):--newline----tab--    def canWinNim(self, n):--newline----tab--        """--newline----tab--        :type n: int--newline----tab--        :rtype: bool--newline----tab--        """--newline----tab--        # strategy: the one with 4 remaining must loose--newline----tab--        # A, B players--newline----tab--        # if n == 4k, then at each round B can make A+B both take 4, --newline----tab--        # eventually leave 4 to A, A lose--newline----tab--        # if n == 4k + i (i <= 3), then A can always take i first and B will--newline----tab--        # finanly lose as he faces above scenario like A--newline----tab----newline----tab--        return bool(n%4!=0)
